SELECT a.hotelSeq ,a.hotelName ,a.hotelContent ,a.hotelRating ,a.hotelTypeCD ,a.areaCD ,b.roomName ,b.roomPrice ,b.roomTypeCD ,b.roomTotalRating ,b.tvNy ,b.wifiNy ,poolNy ,b.bathNy ,b.bathSuppliesNy ,b.airNy ,b.roomSeq ,c.bkCheckIn ,c.bkCheckOut
ORDER BY a.hotelSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT a.hotelSeq ,a.hotelName ,a.hotelContent ,a.hotelRating ,a.areaCD ,a.hotelTypeCD ,a.htRegDate ,a.htUpdate ,a.htDelny ,a.wishlist_seq ,b.roomPrice FROM hotellist a LEFT JOIN roomdetail b on a.hotelSeq = b.roomSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.hotelSeq = #{hotelSeq}
